Yes, as public perception of cannabis shifts, and more states legalize its use, we can expect to see new innovations in the industry. 

One area of interest is the development of new cannabis-based products. For example, some companies are exploring the potential of using CBD and other cannabis compounds in skincare products, beverages, and pet products. As research into the medicinal properties of cannabis continues, we may see more cannabis-derived pharmaceuticals gain FDA approval.

Additionally, researchers are exploring the potential of new cannabis strains, cannabinoid isolates, and other extracts. This research could lead to the development of new and more effective treatments for a wide range of conditions.

As the cannabis industry evolves, it is likely that we will see new business models, supply chains, and technology emerge to meet the needs of this ever-growing field. The possibilities are vast, but only time will tell what innovations will ultimately take hold and contribute to the industry's continued growth.
